problem_names:
lemma reduction_val:
  assumes "val v"
  assumes "v \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v v'"
  shows False

lemma reduction_deterministic:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'"
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t''"
  shows "t'' = t'"

lemma reduction_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'"
  assumes "t' \<Down> v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"

lemma reduction_trc_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* t'"
  assumes "t' \<Down> v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"

theorem reduction_trc_val_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* v"
  assumes "val v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"
translations:
lemma reduction_val:
  assumes "val v"
  assumes "v \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v v'"
  shows False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  val v
  v \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v v'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by (auto elim: val.cases reduction_inv)

lemma reduction_deterministic:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'"
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t''"
  shows "t'' = t'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t'' = t'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'
  t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t'' = t'
by (induct arbitrary: t'') (blast dest: reduction_val elim: reduction_inv)+
subsubsection\<open> Reduction is consistent with evaluation \<close>

lemma reduction_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'"
  assumes "t' \<Down> v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v t'
  t' \<Down> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
by (induct arbitrary: v) (auto elim!: evalOP_inv val.cases intro: eval_val)

lemma reduction_trc_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* t'"
  assumes "t' \<Down> v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* t'
  t' \<Down> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
by induct (auto simp: reduction_eval)

theorem reduction_trc_val_eval:
  assumes "t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* v"
  assumes "val v"
  shows "t \<Down> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>v\<^sup>* v
  val v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<Down> v
by (induct rule: converse_rtranclp_induct) (auto intro: eval_val reduction_trc_eval)

text\<open>

We show the converse (of sorts) using the frame stack machinery of the
next section.

\<close>
end
